title: X-mas wishlists
content:
What is everyone wishing Santa Claus (tm (c) Coca Cola) would bring? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-christmas.gif[/img]

I don't really have any need to get anything, but it's a good opportunity get some records, books, and candy. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: X-mas wishlists
content:
Oh, I wish he would bring me a laptop this christmas. That'd be cool! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] But it's far from possible... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

It'd be great to have a 2006 Xmas-mod disk under the tree. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] [hr][img]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/983/vegetableswk2.gif[/img]

title: Re: X-mas wishlists
content:
Multimedia Fusion 2. Or a Wii.

World peace. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: X-mas wishlists
content:
That's a good choice Djaser, to me 2007 is going to be extremely good, I'm sure of that. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] I just have the feeling. And just a few minutes ago I got a truckload more evidence for it, as I discovered William Gibson's new book is scheduled to be released on August 2007. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] That piece of news has been announced in October already, but I didn't get to hear it until now!3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Happy Holidays
content: I want my KeenMod to rise from the dead and kick ass. I really really want it to.

title: Re: Happy Holidays
content:
As do I. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

And my own mod too! (Although it's not actually dead..)3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: X-mas wishlists
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]That's a good choice Djaser, to me 2007 is going to be extremely good, I'm sure of that. [hr][/quote]
That's good to hear. Changes are high that 2007 also will top 2006 for me, which has been my first good year in a very long time.

I also 2nd Xky's wish but I think we all do. Can't you be my personal Santa Claus Xky?-----------------
